Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Brawny \Brawn"y\, a. Having large, strong muscles; muscular; fleshy; strong. ``Brawny limbs.'' --W. Irving. [1913 Webster]
Syn: Muscular; fleshy; strong; bulky; sinewy; athletic; stalwart; powerful; robust. [1913 Webster]

brawny adj : (of a person) possessing physical strength and weight; rugged and powerful; "a hefty athlete"; "a muscular boxer"; "powerful arms" [syn: {hefty}, {muscular}, {powerful}, {sinewy}] [also: {brawniest}, {brawnier}]
